title: Augment + bundle and Distortion bundle gemstones
body: So if you buy a augment bundle and get the gemstone and want to buy the distortion bundle that comes with another gemstone will you get it if purchased on the same day?

replies.body: The bundle that includes the gemstone is on a 24 hour cooldown.  Purchasing two on the same day will not result in 2 gemstones, but instead 24 hours after you obtained the first.  We also have a [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide with more information on these bundles.  Let me know if you have any questions!
